definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 4:b. [[אַבְרָם]]: Spiegelberg:Randglossen 14 cp. Pal. n.pr. geogr. ḥḳr’ª’ªbrru = [[חקל אברם]] (c.Eg. art.masc.), in Sheshonk list. As regards etym., Nö:l. c. al. expl. as ‘the father [a divine title] is exalted’ (cf. [[יְהוֹרָם]], [[מַלְכִּירָם]], [[חִירָם]][[[אֲ]]]).
